CustomField.description: The WHERE clause of a SOQL query used to find the record: - Use :param to pass in the String input - Use :paramAsNumber to pass in the input cast as a Double
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The WHERE clause of a SOQL query used to find the record: - Use :param to pass in the String input - Use :paramAsNumber to pass in the input cast as a Double
CustomField.label: Query
